## HoverLinkSource interface


**Signature:**


## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`defaultMod`](obsidian.HoverLinkSource.defaultMod.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Whether or not the <code>hover-link</code> event requires the 'Mod' key to be pressed to trigger. |
|  [`display`](obsidian.HoverLinkSource.display.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The string that will be displayed in the 'Page preview' plugin settings. It should match your plugin's display name. |
